================================================================================================================= -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Notable Problems i can forsee with the build.
We don't get Damage from our lab untill cruel, and if we take Glad first, we're unable to get pain attunment until Uber lab. this means the transistion from our merc tree to our uber tree might be really rough. This is why our pre-cluster merc tree travels to pain attunment. so we have the damage to finish kitava without too much struggle.
DO NOT swtich to low life untill you have pain attunment, you'll be halfing your EHP so you want to make sure you're going to benifit greatly before you swap.
Void Sphere Procs Corrupting Fever. along with second wind this means we can quite effectively clear mobs and void sphere will consume corpses, making mapping a breeze. The other advantage of this setup is that we'll be stack up Corrupting Blood faster vs bosses aswell.
